name: Trading Tab UI/UX Upgrade
goal: Upgrade Trading tab from 14/25 to 24/25 — Bloomberg-grade execution terminal with polished chrome, animations, price visualization, and CSS variable compliance

A.name: trading-chrome
A.description: Icon polish, CSS variable compliance, animations, market status, position sparklines

B.name: trading-dataviz
B.description: Price chart widget, order history timeline polish

stories.title: Replace hardcoded colors + icon polish
stories.description: Replace all hardcoded Tailwind colors with CSS variables. Replace * asterisk bullets in Trading Tips with Lucide CheckCircle2 icons. Replace × HTML entity in ConnectionSettingsModal close button with Lucide X icon.
acceptanceCriteria: Zero hardcoded green-500/red-500/blue-600/amber-600/indigo-600/purple-600 etc in Trading.tsx
All colors use var(--color-*) CSS variables or opacity variants of them
Trading Tips bullets use Lucide icons not asterisks
ConnectionSettingsModal close button uses Lucide X icon
All external link colors use var(--color-info) or var(--color-accent)

stories.title: Staggered entry animations + skeleton loading
stories.description: Add skeleton loading state for initial page render. Add staggered fade-in-up animations on all Card sections. Modal should animate in with scale-in + backdrop fade.
acceptanceCriteria: Page shows skeleton placeholders while useTrading loads
Each Card section has animate-fade-in-up with staggered delays (50ms increments)
ConnectionSettingsModal backdrop fades in, card scales in
Content visible transition matches Dashboard pattern

stories.title: Mini price chart widget
stories.description: Create a pure SVG mini price chart that shows intraday price movement for the selected symbol. Uses seeded random data for demo mode. Placed in sidebar above positions.
acceptanceCriteria: New PriceChart.tsx component with pure SVG (no external libs)
Shows 20-point sparkline with gradient fill below the line
Green line/fill when price up, red when down
Hover shows crosshair with price tooltip
Uses CSS variables for all colors
Responsive — fills container width
Integrated into Trading.tsx sidebar

stories.title: Market status progress bar + countdown
stories.description: Upgrade MarketStatusDisplay with a progress bar showing trading day elapsed and a countdown timer to market close/open.
acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar shows % of trading day elapsed (9:30 AM - 4:00 PM ET)
Countdown timer shows HH:MM:SS to next market event (open or close)
Pre-market (4:00-9:30) and after-hours (4:00-8:00) phases labeled
Progress bar uses CSS variable colors with gradient fill
Timer updates every second via setInterval

stories.title: Position sparklines + hover polish
stories.description: Add mini SVG sparklines to each position card in the sidebar. Add hover:shadow-lg transition and active scale feedback on position buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: Each position card shows a 40x16 SVG sparkline (same pattern as Dashboard PositionList)
Sparklines use seeded random data per symbol for consistent display
Position cards have hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200
Position cards have click-feedback (active:scale-[0.98])
Selected position has animate-pulse-subtle on border

stories.title: Order history timeline polish
stories.description: Polish the orders list in TradeExecutor with timeline-style layout, timestamp display, staggered animations on each order row.
acceptanceCriteria: Order rows have staggered fade-in-up animation (50ms delay per row)
Each order shows relative timestamp (e.g. '2m ago', '1h ago')
Timeline dot connector between orders (vertical line with dots)
Replace all hardcoded colors in TradeExecutor.tsx with CSS variables
Hover effect on order rows: shadow-lg transition
Empty state icon is properly sized and animated
